episode: Whenever I crossed a school student my childhood nostalgic feelings get started to run on my mind.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Whenever I crossed a school student my childhood nostalgic feelings get started to run on my mind

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so sweet! What's the most nostalgic memory that comes to mind?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I started to think about my parents and friends

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like you're missing them a bit, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I miss them a lot especially my father who is no more

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm so sorry to hear that. Losing a parent is tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Absolutely my father grow up me with many dreams and he wanted to look me in graduation costume

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must be really tough for you, not being able to fulfill his dream

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes i need to fulfill that dream without him on my graduation day

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure he'd be proud of you no matter what, and that you'll make him proud even if he's not there physically

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes only his words are still sounds in my heart

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like his memory is still with you, guiding you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes those days are ever happy days of my life

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those memories will always be precious to you, I'm sure.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Absolutely it is ever precious in my life.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's beautiful that you cherish them so much.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thankyou and like you said i am happy for fulfilling their dreams

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's the best way to honor his memory, by living your dreams.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I still follow his words and feels nostalgic for my childhood happy days

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's lovely that you hold onto those memories and his words.
